overview: Nathan Lang is an actor and voice over talent, with more than a decade of experience behind the microphone. Nathan is a young, hip, conversational, friendly, genuine, versatile voice over talent, and storyteller, with a full broadcast-quality studio featuring (ISDN, Phone-patch, Source-Connect, mp3, WAV and FTP capabilities) based in NYC. Nathan Lang markets himself as a performer who brings a uniquely individual style of storytelling to campaigns in nearly every media. With a sound that is in the neighborhood of 20’s-40’s. Nathan has provided rich narrative timelines for clients that include: TV, BET, NIKE, PBS, Pepsi, Verizon, SONY, Miller Beer, AT&T, Footlocker, and McDonald’s to name just a few. Need a voiceover for your commercial, narrative or promo brand? What story can Nathan tell for you?
